website_summaries.verdict: Simple yet holds up to 500 degrees of sizzling heat.
pros: We love that you can throw this brick onto a stove or grill and instantly add appeal to any dish
Impressive and requires little in the way of preparation to create tasty dishes
Customers especially love how this salt brick adds flavor to seafood

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING FLAVOR
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor told me about this salt block. She said if you cook a steak on it, it will be the best you ever had. I was doubtful but decided to give it a try. I put a little olive oil and some pepper on my steak, cooked it on the slab for 5 minutes each side and had a beautifully cooked med-med rare steak. IT WAS AMAZING!!!!! I cook everything on my salt block now. It gives amazing flavor to anything you cook on it.....seafood, chicken, vegetables, etc. My recommendation - let the grill heat this up for 15 minutes and then cook your meat on it.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Estes

customer_reviews.title: Cooks Fish Beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how easy this make cooking fish! I was nervous because some of the reviews mentioned it cracking. I have not had any issues with this. I don't ever get it wet -- to clean I just scrap off the top, wrap in a clean dishtowel, and store it. Candidly, I was super careful about heating it slowly for the first use, but after that I just placed it on the grill and turned up the heat. Never had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: PhDTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Via unique and a no brainer...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great culinary technique for stove top cooking or BBQ. It will not over power your dish if you read up on different ways to utilize it. This is a fairly simple and new mode of cooking. Look and research. Feb 10, 2017 Update I had to retire my salt pan. I logged about 100 hours of heavy grilling and a lot of liquid run off. The run off is what did it in. Well, I am going to smoke it for 3 days and continue its use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M.O.G.O.M.

customer_reviews.title: Do your research and you’ll love it.
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift, went over very well. Works great as long as you research how to use it!
customer_reviews.author: paige snyder

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried as I read reviews online than other (thinner) salt blocks exploded on people. But I've used this one several times now (actually, I bought 3 of them and used them all several times) and no problems whatsoever! Works Great. Tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: 80sGuyJim

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Cooking Dads
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad and he LOVES it! He tells everyone he knows about it and all the stuff he's been making on it. His favorite is fish and he also loves the idea of letting the block fall apart over time because of the symbology of letting things go and letting nature take its course (he's that kinda guy). Couldn't recommend a better dad gift.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great for steaks. Wish it came with a rack I have to put it in a pan to fry it in and out of the oven but great product
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Not what you would think
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this but it's really not worth it. The first thing I did was cook a burger on this. I spent about 45 minutes slowly heating it up then it took about 10 mins to cook the burger. The burger was no different than any other burger. The salt block was tough to clean. Bottom line is the food is harder to cook and there is no advantage to a salt block. I only used mine once.
customer_reviews.author: cjohn2979

customer_reviews.title: Great for detoxing feet as well as cooking easy cleaning and perfect gift for this cold days
customer_reviews.text: I personally used this item for detoxification of my feet and also comfort in the mornings when it's really cold I will put it in the microwave for 3 minutes or so then wait for the proper heat and put my feet on it really really helps my feet feel really good I am a construction worker and my feet get very sore so I definitely benefit from this and actually have felt a lot better as well
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Mccarty

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We love to cook with these salt blocks. This is a replacement purchase and the block is good and solid. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMan

customer_reviews.title: but its so pretty, that we put candles behind it and left ...
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of a pain in the ass to cook with, and I'm not sure how its any different than just salting your food... but its so pretty, that we put candles behind it and left it on the kitchen table.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Joseph Painter

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift and it’s fantastic! It was a huge hit and everyone seemed to love them!

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great in my Steak Locker. At this point, I don't intend to use it on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: MikeDaytona675

customer_reviews.title: Returned twice. Arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: I have returned TWO of these because they keep arriving broken. I've yet to get one that hasnt been demolished upon arrival. Here's hoping. It was supposed to be a birthday gift. So disappointed:(

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this yet, its a gift. It is larger than expected and quality looks great.

customer_reviews.title: Won’t bbq without it!

customer_reviews.title: Keeps meat juicy while adding subtle flavor
customer_reviews.text: We grill at least 3 times a week. We always use a salt block now. I highly recommend it and this seller has a good quality block at a decent price.

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor without any seasoning!
customer_reviews.text: I only wish I would have ordered a larger size in order to cook more items.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size. As described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. As described. I use mine for slicing raw vegetables to add a little flavor without adding traditional table salt.

customer_reviews.text: This is large with cracks all through it but it's still together. Look forward to a lot of use with this.

customer_reviews.text: Great value. The salt stone is as advertised. I recommend it . It makes a nice gift.

customer_reviews.title: Cooks seafood in a new cool way
customer_reviews.text: Looks very impressive. Cooks seafood in a new cool way

customer_reviews.text: Cooking on the salt block is a unique experience for those who like to "play" with their food. The product itself arrived quickly and well packed.

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: A must have and a total game changer for cooking and putting out appetizers.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product with a flare for the dramatic presentation
customer_reviews.text: As discribed! Awesome product with a flare for the dramatic presentation!!

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use these to make pressed or brick chicken on the grill and they work great. Not only do they press the chicken but they infuse an amazing flavor into the chicken.

customer_reviews.title: Natural crack after washing
customer_reviews.text: After using it for first time properly by slowly indirectly hearing block and next day cleaning only with water and scrapper I notice a big natural crack.

customer_reviews.title: ... really strange looking repair that does not really look like salt. There was salt packed around the repair ...
customer_reviews.text: Block arrived with a broken corner that had a really strange looking repair that does not really look like salt. There was salt packed around the repair but the very corner does not look or feel right. I would have been ok with a chipped corner But this back yard repair concerns me. I've attached a photo so you can make up your own mind. It's getting sent back.
customer_reviews.author: JKC76

customer_reviews.text: Particularly liked the size offered and the instructions that came with the block. And it is an excellent value.

product_meta.title: Zenware 10" x 6" x 2" Natural Himalayan Block Cooking Salt Plate
product_meta.description:
Himalayan Salt by Zenware

Add extra sizzle to your meals and surprise you and your family with the naturally delicious taste of Himalayan Salt. What makes Himalayan Salt different from regular salt? The Himalayan Mountains formed over 200 million years ago, rising over sea salt beds and leaving Himalayan Salt hidden deep beneath its snowy peaks. Our Himalayan Salt kitchen products started their journey within these mountains: carefully extracted, crossing land and sea, and brought to your table for all to enjoy. Experience the difference in taste, color and texture that Zenware Himalayan Salt has to offer. Enjoy simmering, searing and serving your favorite foods and discover what makes your taste buds tingle, with Zenware.

Features

 - Maximum temperature: 500°F
- Designed for stovetop and grill use only *NOT recommended for oven use
- Natural antibacterial properties - easy clean up, no chemical cleaners required
- Includes pamphlet with detailed usage and cleaning instructions

About Zenware

Designed with your health and taste buds in mind, Zenware knows that food preparation is just as important as the food itself. The tools and methods you use to prepare your meals can change how your body feels. Zenware aims to equip you with the best tools you need to prepare easy and delicious meals, all while keeping your healthy lifestyle in mind. All of our products have been designed, tested and proven to provide a palatable experience for any occasion. Whether you are preparing a simple snack for one or a fancy feast for many, Zenware's exceptional quality materials and foolproof designs provide a one-stop-shop for all of your kitchen's needs. Unleash your appreciation for fun, simple, and safe cooking with Zenware.

Disclaimer: Zenware and its agents will not be responsible for any and all liability related to improper or unintended use or modification of the Zenware Salt Block.
feature_bullets: Package Includes: 1 - Zenware 10" x 6" x 2" Natural Himalayan Block Cooking Salt Plate

Add extra sizzle to your meals and enjoy the naturally delicious taste of Himalayan Salt with the Zenware Himalayan Salt Block. Himalayan Salt Blocks impart their flavor to food, making them great for cooking directly on.
Thick salt slab that can be placed on top of your stovetop or BBQ grill for simmering and searing your favorite foods. *NOT recommended for oven use.

Himalayan Salt's natural pink crystals also enhance food presentation, making it suitable for serving chilled food. Simply refrigerate for an hour or two and use it as a serving plate. Whether hot or cold, Himalayan Salt Blocks hold temperatures effectively (up to 500°F).

Impress friends, family and guests at your next holiday feast or barbecue get-together! Whether you are grilling skewers together or using it as a serving tray, your Himalayan Salt Block is sure to please both your eyes and your taste buds.
